Package requirement

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TraceableArtifact
    Interface for any sort of requirement (or whatever else) which is uniquely adressable
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RequirementOrdinary
    Class for plain, ordinary requirements (i.e. something with all features of a requirement enabled)
    RequirementPlaceholder
    Requirement which does not actually exist in the input document but which needs to be inserted in order to maintain a proper hierarchy (used for skipped levels)
    RequirementProxy
    Create a new proxy requirement which does not actually exist but serves as the target of a link (SpecRelation)
    RequirementRoot
    Requirement which constitutes the root of a requirement tree
    RequirementTemporary
    Requirement which can hold text, but is not linked to any surrounding tree of requirements
    RequirementWParent
    Requirement with a mandatory parent
    RequirementWParent.InlineElementCounter
    Storage for the counter of inline elements underneath this requirement
    TraceabilityLinker
    Manages tracedata.
    TraceabilityLinkerNonQualified
    This is a special traceability linker which only manages non-qualified references to previously encountered requirements Thus it allows to find the last occurrens of some "see b)"-requirement and must be used during first-pass.
